member.name: T:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner
member.summary: DesktopPanes design support class for Visual Studio.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.GetCachedTemplateEditingVerbs
member.summary: Override the GetCachedTemplateEditingVerbs method. A control overrides this method to return the list of template editing verbs applicable to the control.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.CreateTemplateEditingFrame(System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb)
member.summary: Override the CreateTemplateEditingFrame method. This method takes a TemplateEditingVerb instance as an argument. TemplateEditingVerb is a designer verb (a class that derives from DesignerVerb) that enables the template editor to add a command to the control at design time.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: A type's Dispose method should release all the resources that it owns. It should also release all resources owned by its base types by calling its parent type's Dispose method.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml
member.summary: As with any other designer, override the GetDesignTimeHtml. Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml
member.summary: As with any other designer, override the GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml. Gets the HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.GetTemplateContent(System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame,System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Override the GetTemplateContent method that gets the template content.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.SetTemplateContent(System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Override the SetTemplateContent method that sets the template content.

member.name: P:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesDesigner.AllowResize
member.summary: Override the AllowResize property inherited from ControlDesigner to enable the control to be resized. It is recommended that controls allow resizing when in template mode even if they normally do not allow resizing.

member.name: T:DUEMETRI.UI.Design.WebControls.DesktopPanesTemplate
member.summary: DesktopPanes design support class for Visual Studio. Pane Template.

member.name: T:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes
member.summary: DesktopPanes class for supporting three pane browsing

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes.DataBind
member.summary: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes.CreateControlStyle
member.summary: Web server control can set its control style to any class that derives from Style by overriding the WebControl.CreateControlStyle method

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes.GetHorizontalSeparator
member.summary: Returns a reference to Horizontal separator

member.name: M:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes.GetVerticalSeparator
member.summary: Returns a reference to Vertical separator

member.summary: The cell spacing of the rendered table.

member.summary: The width of the rendered table.

member.summary: The height of the rendered table.

member.name: P:DUEMETRI.UI.WebControls.DesktopPanes.GridLines
member.summary: The grid lines to be shown in the rendered table.

member.summary: The style to be applied to LeftPane.
